subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ plan to speak with free agent Liván Hernández, the veteran right-handed starter who went 11-11 last season with the Diamondbacks.
snippet: The Mets’ plan to speak with free agent Liván Hernández, the veteran right-handed starter who went 11-11 last season with the Diamondbacks.
